scripts.build-desktop: cp ./index-desktop.html ./build/index.html && cp ./fleek.config-desktop.json ./build/fleek.config.json && cp ./icons.css ./build && cp ./pxtsim.js ./build && cp ./sim.js ./build && cp ./sim.css ./build
scripts.build-mobile: cp ./index-mobile.html ./build/index.html && cp ./fleek.config-mobile.json ./build/fleek.config.json && cp ./icons.css ./build && cp ./pxtsim.js ./build && cp ./sim.js ./build && cp ./sim.css ./build
